channel.title: How do i call methods?
channel.description:
I need to call the save method and put it under the initialization() so it saves the char file upon login. I got a player.java and playersave.java How do I get the saving method from either of these and put it under initialization() so it runs at the start up.
Thanks in advance! :)

item.title: How do i call methods?
item.dc:creator: @scapexscape scapexscape
item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

I added savefile = true;, it compiles ok and its all over source… why isnt it working?

[code=java] public void initialize() { /* First packet sent - Gnarly */

savefile = true;

sendQuest("@whi@The @whi@Offical @whi@Confessions @whi@Bank", 5383);

sendQuest("@red@Pk-Points", 923);
sendQuest("@whi@Pk", 925);
sendQuest("@whi@"+pkpoints, 924);
sendQuest("@red@Deaths", 926);
sendQuest("@whi@Ded", 928);
sendQuest("@whi@ "+deathcount, 927);

sendMessage(“Welcome to Confessions!”);
sendMessage(“Owner is Confessions”);
sendMessage(“Make sure to read the ::rules and ::commands”);
sendMessage(“Have a nice time playing GnarlyPK!”);[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i call methods?
item.dc:creator: @scapexscape scapexscape
item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

I dont understand.
Give me an example with this and please be patient with me… im new to this part of coding.

Here is what it says:

[code=java] public void initialize() { /* First packet sent - Gnarly */

sendQuest("@whi@The @whi@Offical @whi@Confessions @whi@Bank", 5383);

sendQuest("@red@Pk-Points", 923);
sendQuest("@whi@Pk", 925);
sendQuest("@whi@"+pkpoints, 924);
sendQuest("@red@Deaths", 926);
sendQuest("@whi@Ded", 928);
sendQuest("@whi@ "+deathcount, 927);

sendMessage(“Welcome to Confessions!”);
sendMessage(“Owner is Confessions”);
sendMessage(“Make sure to read the ::rules and ::commands”);
sendMessage(“Have a nice time playing GnarlyPK!”);

sendFrame126(“GnarlyPK -”+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " online-", 6570);[/code]

under: public void initialize()
I want to add the saving method.

The problems I have are:

[ol][li]Finding the method[/li]
[li]Inserting the method[/li][/ol]

item.title: How do i call methods?

item.description:
@scapexscape wrote:

The thing is i dont understand what that means… im not “new” to servers but this calling of methods ive never done… but I got a client.java with initialization() in the source and I need to call the saving method so it save upon login. I dont know where this method is or how to call it… if you give me a clue (as source can be different), I just need to know what to search and where to search it and how to place the method under this part of the source.

The main idea is to get player files to save upon logging in instead of after logging out… because most servers do it when they logout or every 3mins or summing
